SELECT LECNOTICE_ID AS lecNoticeId, LEC_ID AS lecId, PROFES_ID AS profesId, LECNOTICE_NAME AS lecNoticeName, LECNOTICE_DATE AS lecNoticeDate, LECNOTICE_DESC AS lecNoticeDesc, FILE_NAME AS fileName, FILE_DETAIL AS fileDetail, VIEW_CNT AS viewCnt FROM LEC_NOTICE ORDER BY LECNOTICE_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, inner.* FROM ( SELECT LECNOTICE_ID AS lecNoticeId, LEC_ID AS lecId, PROFES_ID AS profesId, LECNOTICE_NAME AS lecNoticeName, LECNOTICE_DATE AS lecNoticeDate, LECNOTICE_DESC AS lecNoticeDesc, FILE_NAME AS fileName, FILE_DETAIL AS fileDetail, VIEW_CNT AS viewCnt FROM LEC_NOTICE
AND INSTR(LECNOTICE_NAME, #{keyword}) > 0
AND INSTR(PROFES_ID, #{keyword}) > 0
AND INSTR(LECNOTICE_DESC, #{keyword}) > 0
AND ( INSTR(LECNOTICE_NAME, #{keyword}) > 0 OR INSTR(PROFES_ID, #{keyword}) > 0 OR INSTR(LECNOTICE_DESC, #{keyword}) > 0 )
ORDER BY LECNOTICE_DATE DESC, TO_NUMBER(LECNOTICE_ID) DESC ) inner WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRow}

SELECT LECNOTICE_ID AS lecNoticeId, LEC_ID AS lecId, PROFES_ID AS profesId, LECNOTICE_NAME AS lecNoticeName, LECNOTICE_DATE AS lecNoticeDate, LECNOTICE_DESC AS lecNoticeDesc, FILE_NAME AS fileName, FILE_DETAIL AS fileDetail, VIEW_CNT AS viewCnt FROM LEC_NOTICE WHERE LECNOTICE_ID = #{lecNoticeId}
